description.narrative:
Incorporation and incubation of a private company for value addition and marketing of Agricultural and Dairy food products of smallfarmers in District Rajanpur Project Title Incorporation and incubation of a private company for value addition and marketing of Agricultural and Dairy food products of small farmers in District Rajanpur Project Duration Duration for the proposed incubation support will cover the period of 12 months, tentatively from 1st Apr. 2014 to 28th Mar.2015 subject to approval conditions, however company will continue building its organizational and operational maturity after the subject duration. Project Location Proposed locationfor company's office is Kot Mithan city in District Rajanpur, however the scope of its operationsmay range all over the country, initially starting in following 3 districts: Rajanpur D.G. Khan Rahim Yar Khan
Objectives <(>&<)> Outcomes: OVERALL OBJECTIVE: To create sustainable convergence of a social enterprise and HELP Foundation for organizational sustainability and socioeconomic development of small farmers particularly the three farmer associations namely Swail, Dharti and Al-Hamad formed under Oxfam Novib#s earlier project. SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES: To eliminate exploitation of small farmers andmaximize their income through providing an affiliated business platform for the marketing of their agricultural and dairy products To contribute in Government of Pakistan/Punjab's efforts for ensuring fair returns to farmers through developing a collective marketing system for them in District Rajanpur To create a business enterprise and its sustainable convergence with HELP Foundation's non-profit development and humanitarian work for organizational sustainability Outcome-1 (Company incorporation andcapacity building): A Private Limited Company incorporated, capacitated and actively dealing mainly in agriculture offering fair prices to the farmers and in addition sharing at least 20% of the profit with them putting an end the exploitation and monopolyof the middleman.. Outcome-2 (Creating institutional interaction of the Company, HELP and the Trust): The Company, HELP Foundation and the Trust have signed their mutual Terms of Engagement for smooth institutional interaction Outcome-3 (Managing social enterprise of the Company): The Company has met target of it Phase-1 business (grains marketing)as per the Business Plan

participating-org.narrative: Help foundation is a relatively new counterpart for Oxfam-Novib. Cooperation has been on adhoc basis, i.e. on Media and Advocacy Project directly and some other projects indirectly through Oxfam GB. HELP foundation has worked amongst others with OGB and ON in the“Pre-Flood Preparatory Work” project (2007-2008), with OGB in the “Community Based Disaster Preparedness Project” (2008-2009), in the “Community Based Disaster Risk Reduction <(>&<)> Sustainable Livelihood” (2010-2012) and with OGB and Unicef in the“Emergency Response Flash Flood” project (2008). Furhtermore HELP foundation has had project contracts with Plan International, CONCERN world wide, Save the Children and USAID. For Help Foundation the relation with ON is based on values and honour.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood

description.narrative: no of policy changes regarding pro-poor markets and financial systems
